string.text: Move down the street. In which case - back.

Thank you Tagged for all the help. It was a tough fight. We will make camp here tonight.
If you go further, it will tell you about the area. If you return back to transition and go right to reach the bus station. But there hurt the ground is open and unsafe.
If you go forward, you will be in front of the hotel. The right base of the monolith. The guys without a roof.
For the base stadium. We were planning on using him to the station to get. That's all.
Thanks for the help. Good luck.
I want to join the cast
You hurt us, but now we need soldiers, Yes, and something tells me that you're a valiant warrior. Are you really ready to enter into a "Monolith"?
Well, you're in men "the Monolith". Get your gear and I suggest you to read our Charter.
